channel.title: How some1 can join my Hamachi server..reply pls
channel.description: Can any 1 tell me how some1 can log in to my server and what he need to do to log in(download anything???)..thanks :)

item.title: How some1 can join my Hamachi server..reply pls
item.dc:creator: @wyski wyski
item.description:
@wyski wrote:

This is a tutorial for those of you who are to lazy to make a real server so ima show you how to make a hamachi one!

lvl 1/10
Very easy
2 steps

step 1:
Well first off your going to need a server if you dont have one. You can get them here

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

download the one you want and you have it.

step 2:
Now you have to download hamachi here https://secure.logmein.com/products/hamachi/list.asp

Make an account for the hamachi. Also there are chat rooms with hamachi so thats kinda cool and you can update the chat for new updates on the server, hamachi also works for any other games!
Then on the bottom right hand corner were theres a triangle click it and create a new network and name it w/e you want it to be.

Once youv done all this you can start your server up and then you connect to the ip at the top of the hamachi!

You now have your own hamachi server!
(Sorry that there were no pictures photobucket wasnt working for me)

Made by Pkgod
If you use this tut just give me some credit lol dont leech!

Read full topic
